author: Sinéad Brennan
title: Cancer charity launches 'race that nearly wasn't'
description: Breakthrough Cancer Research has launched a virtual race fundraiser that will see participants cover 2km in distance for 20 days throughout the month of April.
content:
Breakthrough Cancer Research has launched a virtual race fundraiser that will see participants cover 2km in distance for 20 days during the month of April.
